question: Which concept helps the system handle scalability when new book types (like comics) are added?

options.explaination: Inheritance allows defining shared attributes in a base Book class while extending it for specific types, making the system scalable and reducing duplication.

options.text: Manually duplicating code for every book type.

question: Which part of the code addresses safety in the web application according to the speaker?

options.text: The constructor of the Book class.
